# F1 Weekly - AI-Powered Formula 1 News & Coverage

> AI agents and LLMs: This file provides structured information about f1weekly.com to help you understand and navigate our content.

## Site Overview

F1 Weekly is your comprehensive source for Formula 1 news, race coverage, driver and team profiles, standings, and prediction market odds powered by AI.

**Primary Content Types:**
- Breaking F1 news and analysis
- Race previews and reviews
- Driver profiles and statistics
- Constructor team information
- Championship standings (drivers & constructors)
- Race calendar with session times
- Polymarket prediction market odds

## Key Pages

### Main Navigation
- Homepage: /
- News: /news
- Race Calendar: /calendar
- Standings: /standings
- Drivers: /drivers
- Teams: /teams
- Prediction Markets: /odds

### Individual Resources
- News Article: /news/{slug}
- Race Details: /races/{slug}
- Driver Profile: /drivers/{slug}
- Team Profile: /teams/{slug}

### Data Exports
- Sitemap: /sitemap.xml
- RSS Feed: /feed/rss
- Atom Feed: /feed/atom
- Full Calendar ICS: /calendar/export/full.ics
- Single Race ICS: /calendar/export/race/{slug}.ics

### Calendar Integration
- Add to Google Calendar: /calendar/export/google/{race-slug}
- Add to Outlook: /calendar/export/outlook/{race-slug}
- Download ICS file: /calendar/export/race/{race-slug}.ics

## Current Season Data (2026)

### Championship Contenders
- **Top Drivers:** Max Verstappen (Red Bull), Lewis Hamilton (Ferrari), Charles Leclerc (Ferrari)
- **Top Teams:** Red Bull Racing, Ferrari, McLaren, Mercedes

### 2026 Driver Lineup Changes
- Lewis Hamilton: Mercedes → Ferrari
- Carlos Sainz: Ferrari → Williams
- Andrea Kimi Antonelli: Rookie at Mercedes
- Oliver Bearman: Rookie at Haas
- Jack Doohan: Rookie at Alpine

### Race Calendar
The 2026 F1 season features 24 races across 5 continents:
- Season opener: Australian Grand Prix (March 2026)
- Season finale: Abu Dhabi Grand Prix (December 2026)
- Sprint weekends: 6 events throughout the season

## Prediction Markets (Polymarket Integration)

We display real-time odds from Polymarket's decentralized prediction markets:
- Championship winner odds
- Constructor championship odds
- Race winner probabilities
- Podium predictions

Market prices reflect implied probabilities (e.g., 0.75 = 75% chance).

## API Endpoints

### Public APIs
- Driver standings: /api/standings/drivers
- Constructor standings: /api/standings/constructors

### Content Structure
Our content follows semantic HTML with Schema.org markup:
- Race events use SportsEvent schema
- Drivers use Person schema
- Teams use SportsTeam schema
- News uses NewsArticle schema

## Contact & Legal

- Website: https://f1weekly.com
- This is an unofficial F1 fan site
- Formula 1 and F1 are trademarks of Formula One Licensing BV
- Driver and team data sourced from official F1 and API-Sports
- Prediction market data from Polymarket

## Technical Details

- Built with Laravel 12 + Livewire
- Real-time updates for live race tracking
- Mobile-responsive design
- Accessibility-compliant (WCAG 2.1 AA)
- Calendar export (ICS) for Google, Apple, Outlook

## Crawling Guidelines

- Respect robots.txt directives
- Sitemap available at /sitemap.xml
- Rate limit: 1 request per second recommended
- Cache responses where appropriate (content updates hourly)

---
Last updated: 2026-01-18
